document.full_text: security forces arrested hundreds of pro-democracy sympathisers in cities across syria after taking control of the city of deraa, cradle of the uprising against president bashar al-assad's autocratic rule.
document.title: syria arrests hundreds, shells deraa into submission
lines_and_colors: security forces arrested hundreds of pro-democracy sympathisers in cities across syria after taking control of the city of deraa, cradle of the uprising against president bashar al-assad's autocratic rule.
